playn.core
Class Mouse.LayerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  playn.core.Mouse.LayerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Mouse.LayerListener
Enclosing interface:
Mouse
public static class Mouse.LayerAdapter
extends Object
implements Mouse.LayerListener

A Mouse.LayerListener implementation with NOOP stubs provided for each method.

Constructor Summary
Mouse.LayerAdapter()
           
 
Method Summary
 void onMouseDown(Mouse.ButtonEvent event)
          Called when the mouse is pressed.

 void onMouseMove(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
          Called when the mouse is moved and is not currently engaged in a drag (see Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent).
 void onMouseOut(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
          Called when the mouse leaves a Layer.
 void onMouseOver(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
          Called when the mouse enters a Layer.
 void onMouseUp(Mouse.ButtonEvent event)
          Called when the mouse is released.
 void onMouseWheelScroll(Mouse.WheelEvent event)
          Called when mouse wheel scroll occurs while the mouse is hovered over the listening layer, or while the layer is active due to having been previously hit by a mouse click which has not yet been released.

onMouseDrag

public void onMouseDrag(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
Description copied from interface: Mouse.LayerListener
Called when the mouse button is pressed on a layer and is subsequently moved (dragged). This event is dispatched to the layer that was "hit" when the mouse button was first pressed.

Specified by:
onMouseDrag in interface Mouse.LayerListener
Parameters:
event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

onMouseMove

public void onMouseMove(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
Description copied from interface: Mouse.LayerListener
Called when the mouse is moved and is not currently engaged in a drag (see Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent). The event is dispatched to the layer which is intersected by the mouse coordinates.

Specified by:
onMouseMove in interface Mouse.LayerListener
Parameters:
event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

onMouseOver

public void onMouseOver(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
Description copied from interface: Mouse.LayerListener
Called when the mouse enters a Layer. Note: MotionEvent is first dispatched to Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) or Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseMove(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent), then to Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseOut(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) and finally to Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseOver(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent). These three events share a single preventDefault state.

Specified by:
onMouseOver in interface Mouse.LayerListener
Parameters:
event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

onMouseOut

public void onMouseOut(Mouse.MotionEvent event)
Description copied from interface: Mouse.LayerListener
Called when the mouse leaves a Layer. Note: MotionEvent is first dispatched to Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseDrag(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) or Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseMove(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent), then to Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseOut(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent) and finally to Mouse.LayerListener.onMouseOver(playn.core.Mouse.MotionEvent). These three events share a single preventDefault state.

Specified by:
onMouseOut in interface Mouse.LayerListener
Parameters:
event - provides mouse position and other metadata.

onMouseWheelScroll

public void onMouseWheelScroll(Mouse.WheelEvent event)
Description copied from interface: Mouse.LayerListener
Called when mouse wheel scroll occurs while the mouse is hovered over the listening layer, or while the layer is active due to having been previously hit by a mouse click which has not yet been released.

Negative velocity corresponds to scrolling north/up. Positive velocity corresponds to scrolling south/down. Each scroll 'click' is 1 velocity.

Specified by:
onMouseWheelScroll in interface Mouse.LayerListener
Parameters:
event - provides wheel velocity and other metadata.
